templates.name: DNP/NP Revenue Case Study
templates.subject: Credentialing, Billing & Licensing — All in One Place
templates.body:
Hi {{Name}},

I hope you’re doing well.

My name is Aban Gul, and I wanted to reach out to introduce myself and explore a potential collaboration.

I run AllCare MBS (https://allcarembs.com), a Revenue Cycle Management company where I am personally involved in day-to-day operations to ensure accuracy, compliance, and consistent turnaround times. We currently support multiple US-based providers and billing companies with end-to-end RCM services—without a sales layer, just direct communication and results.

Depending on your needs, we help organizations and providers to:

Increase patient volume through streamlined billing and AR management

Reduce operational costs by 50–60% per position through offshore support

Scale teams quickly without long-term hiring risk

Maintain quality, compliance, and productivity under a white-label model

Support new and growing practices from setup to full operations

Our team covers:

Medical billing & AR follow-ups

Payment posting & denial management

Credentialing & enrollments

Eligibility checks & prior authorizations

State licensing and practice setup support

We work as an extension of your team with flexible engagement models—per FTE, per task, or volume-based—based on what best fits your workflow.

If this is something you or someone in your network could benefit from, I’d be glad to connect and discuss further. I’m happy to schedule a short call to understand your current setup and see if there’s a mutual fit.

You can reply here or reach me directly at:
Email: info@allcarembs.com
Phone: +1 (660) 282-8077

Looking forward to connecting.

Best regards,
Aban Gul
Director | AllCare MBS
https://allcarembs.com
